55 const std::string PlanningScene::OCTOMAP_NS = "<octomap>";
56 const std::string PlanningScene::DEFAULT_SCENE_NAME = "(noname)";

58 const std::string LOGNAME = "planning_scene";
59 
60 class SceneTransforms : public moveit::core::Transforms
61 {
62 public:
63  SceneTransforms(const PlanningScene* scene) : Transforms(scene->getRobotModel()->getModelFrame()), scene_(scene)
64  {
65  }
66 
67  bool canTransform(const std::string& from_frame) const override
68  {
69  return scene_->knowsFrameTransform(from_frame);
70  }
71 
72  bool isFixedFrame(const std::string& frame) const override
73  {
74  if (frame.empty())
75  return false;
76  if (Transforms::isFixedFrame(frame))
77  return true;
78  if (frame[0] == '/')
79  return knowsObjectFrame(frame.substr(1));
80  else
81  return knowsObjectFrame(frame);
82  }
83 
84  const Eigen::Isometry3d& getTransform(const std::string& from_frame) const override
85  { // the call below also calls Transforms::getTransform() too
86  return scene_->getFrameTransform(from_frame);
87  }
88 
89 private:
90  // Returns true if frame_id is the name of an object or the name of a subframe on an object
91  bool knowsObjectFrame(const std::string& frame_id) const
92  {
93  return scene_->getWorld()->knowsTransform(frame_id);
94  }
95 
96  const PlanningScene* scene_;
97 };

114 PlanningScene::PlanningScene(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model,
115  const collision_detection::WorldPtr& world)
116  : robot_model_(robot_model), world_(world), world_const_(world)
117 {
118  initialize();
119 }
120 
121 PlanningScene::PlanningScene(const urdf::ModelInterfaceSharedPtr& urdf_model,
122  const srdf::ModelConstSharedPtr& srdf_model, const collision_detection::WorldPtr& world)
123  : world_(world), world_const_(world)
124 {
125  if (!urdf_model)
126  throw moveit::ConstructException("The URDF model cannot be NULL");
127 
128  if (!srdf_model)
129  throw moveit::ConstructException("The SRDF model cannot be NULL");
130 
131  robot_model_ = createRobotModel(urdf_model, srdf_model);
132  if (!robot_model_)
133  throw moveit::ConstructException("Could not create RobotModel");
134 
135  initialize();
136 }
137 
138 PlanningScene::~PlanningScene()
139 {
140  if (current_world_object_update_callback_)
141  world_->removeObserver(current_world_object_update_observer_handle_);
142 }
143 
144 void PlanningScene::initialize()
145 {
146  name_ = DEFAULT_SCENE_NAME;
147 
148  scene_transforms_ = std::make_shared<SceneTransforms>(this);
149 
150  robot_state_ = std::make_shared<moveit::core::RobotState>(robot_model_);
151  robot_state_->setToDefaultValues();
152  robot_state_->update();
153 
154  acm_ = std::make_shared<collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix>();
155  // Use default collision operations in the SRDF to setup the acm
156  const std::vector<std::string>& collision_links = robot_model_->getLinkModelNamesWithCollisionGeometry();
157  acm_->setEntry(collision_links, collision_links, false);
158 
159  // allow collisions for pairs that have been disabled
160  const std::vector<srdf::Model::DisabledCollision>& dc = getRobotModel()->getSRDF()->getDisabledCollisionPairs();
161  for (const srdf::Model::DisabledCollision& it : dc)
162  acm_->setEntry(it.link1_, it.link2_, true);
163 
164  setActiveCollisionDetector(collision_detection::CollisionDetectorAllocatorFCL::create());
165 }
166 
167 /* return NULL on failure */
168 moveit::core::RobotModelPtr PlanningScene::createRobotModel(const urdf::ModelInterfaceSharedPtr& urdf_model,
169  const srdf::ModelConstSharedPtr& srdf_model)
170 {
171  moveit::core::RobotModelPtr robot_model(new moveit::core::RobotModel(urdf_model, srdf_model));
172  if (!robot_model || !robot_model->getRootJoint())
173  return moveit::core::RobotModelPtr();
174 
175  return robot_model;
176 }
177 
178 PlanningScene::PlanningScene(const PlanningSceneConstPtr& parent) : parent_(parent)
179 {
180  if (!parent_)
181  throw moveit::ConstructException("NULL parent pointer for planning scene");
182 
183  if (!parent_->getName().empty())
184  name_ = parent_->getName() + "+";
185 
186  robot_model_ = parent_->robot_model_;
187 
188  // maintain a separate world. Copy on write ensures that most of the object
189  // info is shared until it is modified.
190  world_ = std::make_shared<collision_detection::World>(*parent_->world_);
191  world_const_ = world_;
192 
193  // record changes to the world
194  world_diff_ = std::make_shared<collision_detection::WorldDiff>(world_);
195 
196  // Set up the same collision detectors as the parent
197  for (const std::pair<const std::string, CollisionDetectorPtr>& it : parent_->collision_)
198  {
199  const CollisionDetectorPtr& parent_detector = it.second;
200  CollisionDetectorPtr& detector = collision_[it.first];
201  detector = std::make_shared<CollisionDetector>();
202  detector->alloc_ = parent_detector->alloc_;
203  detector->parent_ = parent_detector;
204 
205  detector->cenv_ = detector->alloc_->allocateEnv(parent_detector->cenv_, world_);
206  detector->cenv_const_ = detector->cenv_;
207 
208  detector->cenv_unpadded_ = detector->alloc_->allocateEnv(parent_detector->cenv_unpadded_, world_);
209  detector->cenv_unpadded_const_ = detector->cenv_unpadded_;
210  }
211  setActiveCollisionDetector(parent_->getActiveCollisionDetectorName());
212 }
213 
214 PlanningScenePtr PlanningScene::clone(const PlanningSceneConstPtr& scene)
215 {
216  PlanningScenePtr result = scene->diff();
217  result->decoupleParent();
218  result->setName(scene->getName());
219  return result;
220 }
221 
222 PlanningScenePtr PlanningScene::diff() const
223 {
224  return PlanningScenePtr(new PlanningScene(shared_from_this()));
225 }
226 
227 PlanningScenePtr PlanningScene::diff(const moveit_msgs::PlanningScene& msg) const
228 {
229  PlanningScenePtr result = diff();
230  result->setPlanningSceneDiffMsg(msg);
231  return result;
232 }

234 void PlanningScene::CollisionDetector::copyPadding(const PlanningScene::CollisionDetector& src)
235 {
236  cenv_->setLinkPadding(src.getCollisionEnv()->getLinkPadding());
237  cenv_->setLinkScale(src.getCollisionEnv()->getLinkScale());
238 }
239 
240 void PlanningScene::propogateRobotPadding()
241 {
242  for (std::pair<const std::string, CollisionDetectorPtr>& it : collision_)
243  {
244  if (it.second != active_collision_)
245  it.second->copyPadding(*active_collision_);
246  }
247 }
248 
249 void PlanningScene::CollisionDetector::findParent(const PlanningScene& scene)
250 {
251  if (parent_ || !scene.parent_)
252  return;
253 
254  CollisionDetectorConstIterator it = scene.parent_->collision_.find(alloc_->getName());
255  if (it != scene.parent_->collision_.end())
256  parent_ = it->second->parent_;
257 }
258 
259 void PlanningScene::addCollisionDetector(const collision_detection::CollisionDetectorAllocatorPtr& allocator)
260 {
261  const std::string& name = allocator->getName();
262  CollisionDetectorPtr& detector = collision_[name];
263 
264  if (detector) // already added this one
265  return;
266 
267  detector = std::make_shared<CollisionDetector>();
268 
269  detector->alloc_ = allocator;
270 
271  if (!active_collision_)
272  active_collision_ = detector;
273 
274  detector->findParent(*this);
275 
276  detector->cenv_ = detector->alloc_->allocateEnv(world_, getRobotModel());
277  detector->cenv_const_ = detector->cenv_;
278 
279  // if the current active detector is not the added one, copy its padding to the new one and allocate unpadded
280  if (detector != active_collision_)
281  {
282  detector->cenv_unpadded_ = detector->alloc_->allocateEnv(world_, getRobotModel());
283  detector->cenv_unpadded_const_ = detector->cenv_unpadded_;
284 
285  detector->copyPadding(*active_collision_);
286  }
287 
288  detector->cenv_unpadded_ = detector->alloc_->allocateEnv(world_, getRobotModel());
289  detector->cenv_unpadded_const_ = detector->cenv_unpadded_;
290 }
291 
292 void PlanningScene::setActiveCollisionDetector(const collision_detection::CollisionDetectorAllocatorPtr& allocator,
293  bool exclusive)
294 {
295  if (exclusive)
296  {
297  CollisionDetectorPtr p;
298  CollisionDetectorIterator it = collision_.find(allocator->getName());
299  if (it != collision_.end())
300  p = it->second;
301 
302  collision_.clear();
303  active_collision_.reset();
304 
305  if (p)
306  {
307  collision_[allocator->getName()] = p;
308  active_collision_ = p;
309  return;
310  }
311  }
312 
313  addCollisionDetector(allocator);
314  setActiveCollisionDetector(allocator->getName());
315 }
316 
317 bool PlanningScene::setActiveCollisionDetector(const std::string& collision_detector_name)
318 {
319  CollisionDetectorIterator it = collision_.find(collision_detector_name);
320  if (it != collision_.end())
321  {
322  active_collision_ = it->second;
323  return true;
324  }
325  else
326  {
327  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME,
328  "Cannot setActiveCollisionDetector to '%s' -- it has been added to PlanningScene. "
329  "Keeping existing active collision detector '%s'",
330  collision_detector_name.c_str(), active_collision_->alloc_->getName().c_str());
331  return false;
332  }
333 }
334 
335 void PlanningScene::getCollisionDetectorNames(std::vector<std::string>& names) const
336 {
337  names.clear();
338  names.reserve(collision_.size());
339  for (const std::pair<const std::string, CollisionDetectorPtr>& it : collision_)
340  names.push_back(it.first);
341 }
342 
343 const collision_detection::CollisionEnvConstPtr&
344 PlanningScene::getCollisionEnv(const std::string& collision_detector_name) const
345 {
346  CollisionDetectorConstIterator it = collision_.find(collision_detector_name);
347  if (it == collision_.end())
348  {
349  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Could not get CollisionRobot named '%s'. Returning active CollisionRobot '%s' instead",
350  collision_detector_name.c_str(), active_collision_->alloc_->getName().c_str());
351  return active_collision_->getCollisionEnv();
352  }
353 
354  return it->second->getCollisionEnv();
355 }
356 
357 const collision_detection::CollisionEnvConstPtr&
358 PlanningScene::getCollisionEnvUnpadded(const std::string& collision_detector_name) const
359 {
360  CollisionDetectorConstIterator it = collision_.find(collision_detector_name);
361  if (it == collision_.end())
362  {
363  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME,
364  "Could not get CollisionRobotUnpadded named '%s'. "
365  "Returning active CollisionRobotUnpadded '%s' instead",
366  collision_detector_name.c_str(), active_collision_->alloc_->getName().c_str());
367  return active_collision_->getCollisionEnvUnpadded();
368  }
369 
370  return it->second->getCollisionEnvUnpadded();
371 }
372 
373 void PlanningScene::clearDiffs()
374 {
375  if (!parent_)
376  return;
377 
378  // clear everything, reset the world, record diffs
379  world_ = std::make_shared<collision_detection::World>(*parent_->world_);
380  world_const_ = world_;
381  world_diff_ = std::make_shared<collision_detection::WorldDiff>(world_);
382  if (current_world_object_update_callback_)
383  current_world_object_update_observer_handle_ = world_->addObserver(current_world_object_update_callback_);
384 
385  // use parent crobot_ if it exists. Otherwise copy padding from parent.
386  for (std::pair<const std::string, CollisionDetectorPtr>& it : collision_)
387  {
388  if (!it.second->parent_)
389  it.second->findParent(*this);
390 
391  if (it.second->parent_)
392  {
393  it.second->cenv_unpadded_ = it.second->alloc_->allocateEnv(it.second->parent_->cenv_unpadded_, world_);
394  it.second->cenv_unpadded_const_ = it.second->cenv_unpadded_;
395 
396  it.second->cenv_ = it.second->alloc_->allocateEnv(it.second->parent_->cenv_, world_);
397  it.second->cenv_const_ = it.second->cenv_;
398  }
399  else // This is the parent CollisionDetector
400  {
401  it.second->copyPadding(*parent_->active_collision_);
402  it.second->cenv_const_ = it.second->cenv_;
403  }
404  }
405 
406  scene_transforms_.reset();
407  robot_state_.reset();
408  acm_.reset();
409  object_colors_.reset();
410  object_types_.reset();
411 }
412 
413 void PlanningScene::pushDiffs(const PlanningScenePtr& scene)
414 {
415  if (!parent_)
416  return;
417 
418  if (scene_transforms_)
419  scene->getTransformsNonConst().setAllTransforms(scene_transforms_->getAllTransforms());
420 
421  if (robot_state_)
422  {
423  scene->getCurrentStateNonConst() = *robot_state_;
424  // push colors and types for attached objects
425  std::vector<const moveit::core::AttachedBody*> attached_objs;
426  robot_state_->getAttachedBodies(attached_objs);
427  for (const moveit::core::AttachedBody* attached_obj : attached_objs)
428  {
429  if (hasObjectType(attached_obj->getName()))
430  scene->setObjectType(attached_obj->getName(), getObjectType(attached_obj->getName()));
431  if (hasObjectColor(attached_obj->getName()))
432  scene->setObjectColor(attached_obj->getName(), getObjectColor(attached_obj->getName()));
433  }
434  }
435 
436  if (acm_)
437  scene->getAllowedCollisionMatrixNonConst() = *acm_;
438 
439  collision_detection::CollisionEnvPtr active_cenv = scene->getCollisionEnvNonConst();
440  active_cenv->setLinkPadding(active_collision_->cenv_->getLinkPadding());
441  active_cenv->setLinkScale(active_collision_->cenv_->getLinkScale());
442  scene->propogateRobotPadding();
443 
444  if (world_diff_)
445  {
446  for (const std::pair<const std::string, collision_detection::World::Action>& it : *world_diff_)
447  {
448  if (it.second == collision_detection::World::DESTROY)
449  {
450  scene->world_->removeObject(it.first);
451  scene->removeObjectColor(it.first);
452  scene->removeObjectType(it.first);
453  }
454  else
455  {
456  const collision_detection::World::Object& obj = *world_->getObject(it.first);
457  scene->world_->removeObject(obj.id_);
458  scene->world_->addToObject(obj.id_, obj.pose_, obj.shapes_, obj.shape_poses_);
459  if (hasObjectColor(it.first))
460  scene->setObjectColor(it.first, getObjectColor(it.first));
461  if (hasObjectType(it.first))
462  scene->setObjectType(it.first, getObjectType(it.first));
463 
464  scene->world_->setSubframesOfObject(obj.id_, obj.subframe_poses_);
465  }
466  }
467  }
468 }
469 
470 void PlanningScene::checkCollision(const collision_detection::CollisionRequest& req,
471  collision_detection::CollisionResult& res)
472 {
473  if (getCurrentState().dirtyCollisionBodyTransforms())
474  checkCollision(req, res, getCurrentStateNonConst());
475  else
476  checkCollision(req, res, getCurrentState());
477 }
478 
479 void PlanningScene::checkCollision(const collision_detection::CollisionRequest& req,
480  collision_detection::CollisionResult& res,
481  const moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state) const
482 {
483  checkCollision(req, res, robot_state, getAllowedCollisionMatrix());
484 }
485 
486 void PlanningScene::checkSelfCollision(const collision_detection::CollisionRequest& req,
487  collision_detection::CollisionResult& res)
488 {
489  if (getCurrentState().dirtyCollisionBodyTransforms())
490  checkSelfCollision(req, res, getCurrentStateNonConst());
491  else
492  checkSelfCollision(req, res, getCurrentState());
493 }
494 
495 void PlanningScene::checkCollision(const collision_detection::CollisionRequest& req,
496  collision_detection::CollisionResult& res,
497  const moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state,
498  const collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix& acm) const
499 {
500  // check collision with the world using the padded version
501  getCollisionEnv()->checkRobotCollision(req, res, robot_state, acm);
502 
503  // do self-collision checking with the unpadded version of the robot
504  if (!res.collision || (req.contacts && res.contacts.size() < req.max_contacts))
505  getCollisionEnvUnpadded()->checkSelfCollision(req, res, robot_state, acm);
506 }
507 
508 void PlanningScene::checkCollisionUnpadded(const collision_detection::CollisionRequest& req,
509  collision_detection::CollisionResult& res)
510 {
511  if (getCurrentState().dirtyCollisionBodyTransforms())
512  checkCollisionUnpadded(req, res, getCurrentStateNonConst(), getAllowedCollisionMatrix());
513  else
514  checkCollisionUnpadded(req, res, getCurrentState(), getAllowedCollisionMatrix());
515 }
516 
517 void PlanningScene::checkCollisionUnpadded(const collision_detection::CollisionRequest& req,
518  collision_detection::CollisionResult& res,
519  const moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state,
520  const collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix& acm) const
521 {
522  // check collision with the world using the unpadded version
523  getCollisionEnvUnpadded()->checkRobotCollision(req, res, robot_state, acm);
524 
525  // do self-collision checking with the unpadded version of the robot
526  if (!res.collision || (req.contacts && res.contacts.size() < req.max_contacts))
527  {
528  getCollisionEnvUnpadded()->checkSelfCollision(req, res, robot_state, acm);
529  }
530 }
531 
532 void PlanningScene::getCollidingPairs(collision_detection::CollisionResult::ContactMap& contacts)
533 {
534  if (getCurrentState().dirtyCollisionBodyTransforms())
535  getCollidingPairs(contacts, getCurrentStateNonConst(), getAllowedCollisionMatrix());
536  else
537  getCollidingPairs(contacts, getCurrentState(), getAllowedCollisionMatrix());
538 }
539 
540 void PlanningScene::getCollidingPairs(collision_detection::CollisionResult::ContactMap& contacts,
541  const moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state,
542  const collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix& acm) const
543 {
544  collision_detection::CollisionRequest req;
545  req.contacts = true;
546  req.max_contacts = getRobotModel()->getLinkModelsWithCollisionGeometry().size() + 1;
547  req.max_contacts_per_pair = 1;
548  collision_detection::CollisionResult res;
549  checkCollision(req, res, robot_state, acm);
550  res.contacts.swap(contacts);
551 }
552 
553 void PlanningScene::getCollidingLinks(std::vector<std::string>& links)
554 {
555  if (getCurrentState().dirtyCollisionBodyTransforms())
556  getCollidingLinks(links, getCurrentStateNonConst(), getAllowedCollisionMatrix());
557  else
558  getCollidingLinks(links, getCurrentState(), getAllowedCollisionMatrix());
559 }
560 
561 void PlanningScene::getCollidingLinks(std::vector<std::string>& links, const moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state,
562  const collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix& acm) const
563 {
564  collision_detection::CollisionResult::ContactMap contacts;
565  getCollidingPairs(contacts, robot_state, acm);
566  links.clear();
567  for (collision_detection::CollisionResult::ContactMap::const_iterator it = contacts.begin(); it != contacts.end();
568  ++it)
569  for (const collision_detection::Contact& contact : it->second)
570  {
571  if (contact.body_type_1 == collision_detection::BodyTypes::ROBOT_LINK)
572  links.push_back(contact.body_name_1);
573  if (contact.body_type_2 == collision_detection::BodyTypes::ROBOT_LINK)
574  links.push_back(contact.body_name_2);
575  }
576 }
577 
578 const collision_detection::CollisionEnvPtr& PlanningScene::getCollisionEnvNonConst()
579 {
580  return active_collision_->cenv_;
581 }
582 
583 moveit::core::RobotState& PlanningScene::getCurrentStateNonConst()
584 {
585  if (!robot_state_)
586  {
587  robot_state_ = std::make_shared<moveit::core::RobotState>(parent_->getCurrentState());
588  robot_state_->setAttachedBodyUpdateCallback(current_state_attached_body_callback_);
589  }
590  robot_state_->update();
591  return *robot_state_;
592 }
593 
594 moveit::core::RobotStatePtr PlanningScene::getCurrentStateUpdated(const moveit_msgs::RobotState& update) const
595 {
596  moveit::core::RobotStatePtr state(new moveit::core::RobotState(getCurrentState()));
597  moveit::core::robotStateMsgToRobotState(getTransforms(), update, *state);
598  return state;
599 }
600 
601 void PlanningScene::setAttachedBodyUpdateCallback(const moveit::core::AttachedBodyCallback& callback)
602 {
603  current_state_attached_body_callback_ = callback;
604  if (robot_state_)
605  robot_state_->setAttachedBodyUpdateCallback(callback);
606 }
607 
608 void PlanningScene::setCollisionObjectUpdateCallback(const collision_detection::World::ObserverCallbackFn& callback)
609 {
610  if (current_world_object_update_callback_)
611  world_->removeObserver(current_world_object_update_observer_handle_);
612  if (callback)
613  current_world_object_update_observer_handle_ = world_->addObserver(callback);
614  current_world_object_update_callback_ = callback;
615 }
616 
617 collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix& PlanningScene::getAllowedCollisionMatrixNonConst()
618 {
619  if (!acm_)
620  acm_ = std::make_shared<collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix>(parent_->getAllowedCollisionMatrix());
621  return *acm_;
622 }
623 
624 const moveit::core::Transforms& PlanningScene::getTransforms()
625 {
626  // Trigger an update of the robot transforms
627  getCurrentStateNonConst().update();
628  return static_cast<const PlanningScene*>(this)->getTransforms();
629 }
630 
631 moveit::core::Transforms& PlanningScene::getTransformsNonConst()
632 {
633  // Trigger an update of the robot transforms
634  getCurrentStateNonConst().update();
635  if (!scene_transforms_)
636  {
637  // The only case when there are no transforms is if this planning scene has a parent. When a non-const version of
638  // the planning scene is requested, a copy of the parent's transforms is forced
639  scene_transforms_ = std::make_shared<SceneTransforms>(this);
640  scene_transforms_->setAllTransforms(parent_->getTransforms().getAllTransforms());
641  }
642  return *scene_transforms_;
643 }
644 
645 void PlanningScene::getPlanningSceneDiffMsg(moveit_msgs::PlanningScene& scene_msg) const
646 {
647  scene_msg.name = name_;
648  scene_msg.robot_model_name = getRobotModel()->getName();
649  scene_msg.is_diff = true;
650 
651  if (scene_transforms_)
652  scene_transforms_->copyTransforms(scene_msg.fixed_frame_transforms);
653  else
654  scene_msg.fixed_frame_transforms.clear();
655 
656  if (robot_state_)
657  moveit::core::robotStateToRobotStateMsg(*robot_state_, scene_msg.robot_state);
658  else
659  {
660  scene_msg.robot_state = moveit_msgs::RobotState();
661  scene_msg.robot_state.is_diff = true;
662  }
663 
664  if (acm_)
665  acm_->getMessage(scene_msg.allowed_collision_matrix);
666  else
667  scene_msg.allowed_collision_matrix = moveit_msgs::AllowedCollisionMatrix();
668 
669  active_collision_->cenv_->getPadding(scene_msg.link_padding);
670  active_collision_->cenv_->getScale(scene_msg.link_scale);
671 
672  scene_msg.object_colors.clear();
673  if (object_colors_)
674  {
675  unsigned int i = 0;
676  scene_msg.object_colors.resize(object_colors_->size());
677  for (ObjectColorMap::const_iterator it = object_colors_->begin(); it != object_colors_->end(); ++it, ++i)
678  {
679  scene_msg.object_colors[i].id = it->first;
680  scene_msg.object_colors[i].color = it->second;
681  }
682  }
683 
684  scene_msg.world.collision_objects.clear();
685  scene_msg.world.octomap = octomap_msgs::OctomapWithPose();
686 
687  if (world_diff_)
688  {
689  bool do_omap = false;
690  for (const std::pair<const std::string, collision_detection::World::Action>& it : *world_diff_)
691  {
692  if (it.first == OCTOMAP_NS)
693  do_omap = true;
694  else if (it.second == collision_detection::World::DESTROY)
695  {
696  // if object became attached, it should not be recorded as removed here
697  if (!std::count_if(scene_msg.robot_state.attached_collision_objects.cbegin(),
698  scene_msg.robot_state.attached_collision_objects.cend(),
699  [&it](const moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject& aco) {
700  return aco.object.id == it.first &&
701  aco.object.operation == moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD;
702  }))
703  {
704  moveit_msgs::CollisionObject co;
705  co.header.frame_id = getPlanningFrame();
706  co.id = it.first;
707  co.operation = moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::REMOVE;
708  scene_msg.world.collision_objects.push_back(co);
709  }
710  }
711  else
712  {
713  scene_msg.world.collision_objects.emplace_back();
714  getCollisionObjectMsg(scene_msg.world.collision_objects.back(), it.first);
715  }
716  }
717  if (do_omap)
718  getOctomapMsg(scene_msg.world.octomap);
719  }
720 }
721 
722 namespace
723 {
724 class ShapeVisitorAddToCollisionObject : public boost::static_visitor<void>
725 {
726 public:
727  ShapeVisitorAddToCollisionObject(moveit_msgs::CollisionObject* obj) : boost::static_visitor<void>(), obj_(obj)
728  {
729  }
730 
731  void setPoseMessage(const geometry_msgs::Pose* pose)
732  {
733  pose_ = pose;
734  }
735 
736  void operator()(const shape_msgs::Plane& shape_msg) const
737  {
738  obj_->planes.push_back(shape_msg);
739  obj_->plane_poses.push_back(*pose_);
740  }
741 
742  void operator()(const shape_msgs::Mesh& shape_msg) const
743  {
744  obj_->meshes.push_back(shape_msg);
745  obj_->mesh_poses.push_back(*pose_);
746  }
747 
748  void operator()(const shape_msgs::SolidPrimitive& shape_msg) const
749  {
750  obj_->primitives.push_back(shape_msg);
751  obj_->primitive_poses.push_back(*pose_);
752  }
753 
754 private:
755  moveit_msgs::CollisionObject* obj_;
756  const geometry_msgs::Pose* pose_;
757 };
758 } // namespace
759 
760 bool PlanningScene::getCollisionObjectMsg(moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& collision_obj, const std::string& ns) const
761 {
762  collision_detection::CollisionEnv::ObjectConstPtr obj = world_->getObject(ns);
763  collision_obj.header.frame_id = getPlanningFrame();
764  collision_obj.pose = tf2::toMsg(obj->pose_);
765  collision_obj.id = ns;
766  collision_obj.operation = moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD;
767  if (!obj)
768  return false;
769  ShapeVisitorAddToCollisionObject sv(&collision_obj);
770  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < obj->shapes_.size(); ++j)
771  {
772  shapes::ShapeMsg sm;
773  if (constructMsgFromShape(obj->shapes_[j].get(), sm))
774  {
775  geometry_msgs::Pose p = tf2::toMsg(obj->shape_poses_[j]);
776  sv.setPoseMessage(&p);
777  boost::apply_visitor(sv, sm);
778  }
779  }
780 
781  if (!collision_obj.primitives.empty() || !collision_obj.meshes.empty() || !collision_obj.planes.empty())
782  {
783  if (hasObjectType(collision_obj.id))
784  collision_obj.type = getObjectType(collision_obj.id);
785  }
786  for (const auto& frame_pair : obj->subframe_poses_)
787  {
788  collision_obj.subframe_names.push_back(frame_pair.first);
789  geometry_msgs::Pose p;
790  p = tf2::toMsg(frame_pair.second);
791  collision_obj.subframe_poses.push_back(p);
792  }
793 
794  return true;
795 }
796 
797 void PlanningScene::getCollisionObjectMsgs(std::vector<moveit_msgs::CollisionObject>& collision_objs) const
798 {
799  collision_objs.clear();
800  const std::vector<std::string>& ids = world_->getObjectIds();
801  for (const std::string& id : ids)
802  if (id != OCTOMAP_NS)
803  {
804  collision_objs.emplace_back();
805  getCollisionObjectMsg(collision_objs.back(), id);
806  }
807 }
808 
809 bool PlanningScene::getAttachedCollisionObjectMsg(moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject& attached_collision_obj,
810  const std::string& ns) const
811 {
812  std::vector<moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject> attached_collision_objs;
813  getAttachedCollisionObjectMsgs(attached_collision_objs);
814  for (moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject& it : attached_collision_objs)
815  {
816  if (it.object.id == ns)
817  {
818  attached_collision_obj = it;
819  return true;
820  }
821  }
822  return false;
823 }
824 
825 void PlanningScene::getAttachedCollisionObjectMsgs(
826  std::vector<moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject>& attached_collision_objs) const
827 {
828  std::vector<const moveit::core::AttachedBody*> attached_bodies;
829  getCurrentState().getAttachedBodies(attached_bodies);
830  attachedBodiesToAttachedCollisionObjectMsgs(attached_bodies, attached_collision_objs);
831 }
832 
833 bool PlanningScene::getOctomapMsg(octomap_msgs::OctomapWithPose& octomap) const
834 {
835  octomap.header.frame_id = getPlanningFrame();
836  octomap.octomap = octomap_msgs::Octomap();
837 
838  collision_detection::CollisionEnv::ObjectConstPtr map = world_->getObject(OCTOMAP_NS);
839  if (map)
840  {
841  if (map->shapes_.size() == 1)
842  {
843  const shapes::OcTree* o = static_cast<const shapes::OcTree*>(map->shapes_[0].get());
844  octomap_msgs::fullMapToMsg(*o->octree, octomap.octomap);
845  octomap.origin = tf2::toMsg(map->shape_poses_[0]);
846  return true;
847  }
848  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Unexpected number of shapes in octomap collision object. Not including '%s' object",
849  OCTOMAP_NS.c_str());
850  }
851  return false;
852 }
853 
854 void PlanningScene::getObjectColorMsgs(std::vector<moveit_msgs::ObjectColor>& object_colors) const
855 {
856  object_colors.clear();
857 
858  unsigned int i = 0;
859  ObjectColorMap cmap;
860  getKnownObjectColors(cmap);
861  object_colors.resize(cmap.size());
862  for (ObjectColorMap::const_iterator it = cmap.begin(); it != cmap.end(); ++it, ++i)
863  {
864  object_colors[i].id = it->first;
865  object_colors[i].color = it->second;
866  }
867 }
868 
869 void PlanningScene::getPlanningSceneMsg(moveit_msgs::PlanningScene& scene_msg) const
870 {
871  scene_msg.name = name_;
872  scene_msg.is_diff = false;
873  scene_msg.robot_model_name = getRobotModel()->getName();
874  getTransforms().copyTransforms(scene_msg.fixed_frame_transforms);
875 
876  moveit::core::robotStateToRobotStateMsg(getCurrentState(), scene_msg.robot_state);
877  getAllowedCollisionMatrix().getMessage(scene_msg.allowed_collision_matrix);
878  getCollisionEnv()->getPadding(scene_msg.link_padding);
879  getCollisionEnv()->getScale(scene_msg.link_scale);
880 
881  getObjectColorMsgs(scene_msg.object_colors);
882 
883  // add collision objects
884  getCollisionObjectMsgs(scene_msg.world.collision_objects);
885 
886  // get the octomap
887  getOctomapMsg(scene_msg.world.octomap);
888 }
889 
890 void PlanningScene::getPlanningSceneMsg(moveit_msgs::PlanningScene& scene_msg,
891  const moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents& comp) const
892 {
893  scene_msg.is_diff = false;
894  if (comp.components & moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::SCENE_SETTINGS)
895  {
896  scene_msg.name = name_;
897  scene_msg.robot_model_name = getRobotModel()->getName();
898  }
899 
900  if (comp.components & moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::TRANSFORMS)
901  getTransforms().copyTransforms(scene_msg.fixed_frame_transforms);
902 
903  if (comp.components & moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::ROBOT_STATE_ATTACHED_OBJECTS)
904  {
905  moveit::core::robotStateToRobotStateMsg(getCurrentState(), scene_msg.robot_state, true);
906  for (moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject& attached_collision_object :
907  scene_msg.robot_state.attached_collision_objects)
908  {
909  if (hasObjectType(attached_collision_object.object.id))
910  {
911  attached_collision_object.object.type = getObjectType(attached_collision_object.object.id);
912  }
913  }
914  }
915  else if (comp.components & moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::ROBOT_STATE)
916  {
917  moveit::core::robotStateToRobotStateMsg(getCurrentState(), scene_msg.robot_state, false);
918  }
919 
920  if (comp.components & moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::ALLOWED_COLLISION_MATRIX)
921  getAllowedCollisionMatrix().getMessage(scene_msg.allowed_collision_matrix);
922 
923  if (comp.components & moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::LINK_PADDING_AND_SCALING)
924  {
925  getCollisionEnv()->getPadding(scene_msg.link_padding);
926  getCollisionEnv()->getScale(scene_msg.link_scale);
927  }
928 
929  if (comp.components & moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::OBJECT_COLORS)
930  getObjectColorMsgs(scene_msg.object_colors);
931 
932  // add collision objects
933  if (comp.components & moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::WORLD_OBJECT_GEOMETRY)
934  getCollisionObjectMsgs(scene_msg.world.collision_objects);
935  else if (comp.components & moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::WORLD_OBJECT_NAMES)
936  {
937  const std::vector<std::string>& ids = world_->getObjectIds();
938  scene_msg.world.collision_objects.clear();
939  scene_msg.world.collision_objects.reserve(ids.size());
940  for (const std::string& id : ids)
941  if (id != OCTOMAP_NS)
942  {
943  moveit_msgs::CollisionObject co;
944  co.id = id;
945  if (hasObjectType(co.id))
946  co.type = getObjectType(co.id);
947  scene_msg.world.collision_objects.push_back(co);
948  }
949  }
950 
951  // get the octomap
952  if (comp.components & moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::OCTOMAP)
953  getOctomapMsg(scene_msg.world.octomap);
954 }
955 
956 void PlanningScene::saveGeometryToStream(std::ostream& out) const
957 {
958  out << name_ << std::endl;
959  const std::vector<std::string>& ids = world_->getObjectIds();
960  for (const std::string& id : ids)
961  if (id != OCTOMAP_NS)
962  {
963  collision_detection::CollisionEnv::ObjectConstPtr obj = world_->getObject(id);
964  if (obj)
965  {
966  out << "* " << id << std::endl; // New object start
967  // Write object pose
968  writePoseToText(out, obj->pose_);
969 
970  // Write shapes and shape poses
971  out << obj->shapes_.size() << std::endl; // Number of shapes
972  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < obj->shapes_.size(); ++j)
973  {
974  shapes::saveAsText(obj->shapes_[j].get(), out);
975  // shape_poses_ is valid isometry by contract
976  writePoseToText(out, obj->shape_poses_[j]);
977  if (hasObjectColor(id))
978  {
979  const std_msgs::ColorRGBA& c = getObjectColor(id);
980  out << c.r << " " << c.g << " " << c.b << " " << c.a << std::endl;
981  }
982  else
983  out << "0 0 0 0" << std::endl;
984  }
985 
986  // Write subframes
987  out << obj->subframe_poses_.size() << std::endl; // Number of subframes
988  for (auto& pose_pair : obj->subframe_poses_)
989  {
990  out << pose_pair.first << std::endl; // Subframe name
991  writePoseToText(out, pose_pair.second); // Subframe pose
992  }
993  }
994  }
995  out << "." << std::endl;
996 }
997 
998 bool PlanningScene::loadGeometryFromStream(std::istream& in)
999 {
1000  return loadGeometryFromStream(in, Eigen::Isometry3d::Identity()); // Use no offset
1001 }
1002 
1003 bool PlanningScene::loadGeometryFromStream(std::istream& in, const Eigen::Isometry3d& offset)
1004 {
1005  if (!in.good() || in.eof())
1006  {
1007  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Bad input stream when loading scene geometry");
1008  return false;
1009  }
1010  std::getline(in, name_);
1011  Eigen::Isometry3d pose; // Transient
1012  do
1013  {
1014  std::string marker;
1015  in >> marker;
1016  if (!in.good() || in.eof())
1017  {
1018  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Bad input stream when loading marker in scene geometry");
1019  return false;
1020  }
1021  if (marker == "*") // Start of new object
1022  {
1023  std::string object_id;
1024  std::getline(in, object_id);
1025  if (!in.good() || in.eof())
1026  {
1027  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Bad input stream when loading object_id in scene geometry");
1028  return false;
1029  }
1030  boost::algorithm::trim(object_id);
1031 
1032  // Read in object pose
1033  if (!readPoseFromText(in, pose))
1034  {
1035  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Failed to read object pose from scene file");
1036  return false;
1037  }
1038  pose = offset * pose; // Transform pose by input pose offset
1039  world_->setObjectPose(object_id, pose);
1040 
1041  // Read in shapes
1042  unsigned int shape_count;
1043  in >> shape_count;
1044  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < shape_count && in.good() && !in.eof(); ++i)
1045  {
1046  const auto shape = shapes::ShapeConstPtr(shapes::constructShapeFromText(in));
1047  if (!shape)
1048  {
1049  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Failed to load shape from scene file");
1050  return false;
1051  }
1052  if (!readPoseFromText(in, pose))
1053  {
1054  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Failed to read pose from scene file");
1055  return false;
1056  }
1057  float r, g, b, a;
1058  if (!(in >> r >> g >> b >> a))
1059  {
1060  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Improperly formatted color in scene geometry file");
1061  return false;
1062  }
1063  if (shape)
1064  {
1065  world_->addToObject(object_id, shape, pose);
1066  if (r > 0.0f || g > 0.0f || b > 0.0f || a > 0.0f)
1067  {
1068  std_msgs::ColorRGBA color;
1069  color.r = r;
1070  color.g = g;
1071  color.b = b;
1072  color.a = a;
1073  setObjectColor(object_id, color);
1074  }
1075  }
1076  }
1077 
1078  // Read in subframes
1079  moveit::core::FixedTransformsMap subframes;
1080  unsigned int subframe_count;
1081  in >> subframe_count;
1082  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < subframe_count && in.good() && !in.eof(); ++i)
1083  {
1084  std::string subframe_name;
1085  in >> subframe_name;
1086  if (!readPoseFromText(in, pose))
1087  {
1088  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Failed to read subframe pose from scene file");
1089  return false;
1090  }
1091  subframes[subframe_name] = pose;
1092  }
1093  world_->setSubframesOfObject(object_id, subframes);
1094  }
1095  else if (marker == ".")
1096  {
1097  // Marks the end of the scene geometry;
1098  return true;
1099  }
1100  else
1101  {
1102  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Unknown marker in scene geometry file: " << marker);
1103  return false;
1104  }
1105  } while (true);
1106 }
1107 
1108 bool PlanningScene::readPoseFromText(std::istream& in, Eigen::Isometry3d& pose) const
1109 {
1110  double x, y, z, rx, ry, rz, rw;
1111  if (!(in >> x >> y >> z))
1112  {
1113  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Improperly formatted translation in scene geometry file");
1114  return false;
1115  }
1116  if (!(in >> rx >> ry >> rz >> rw))
1117  {
1118  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Improperly formatted rotation in scene geometry file");
1119  return false;
1120  }
1121  pose = Eigen::Translation3d(x, y, z) * Eigen::Quaterniond(rw, rx, ry, rz);
1122  return true;
1123 }
1124 
1125 void PlanningScene::writePoseToText(std::ostream& out, const Eigen::Isometry3d& pose) const
1126 {
1127  out << pose.translation().x() << " " << pose.translation().y() << " " << pose.translation().z() << std::endl;
1128  Eigen::Quaterniond r(pose.linear());
1129  out << r.x() << " " << r.y() << " " << r.z() << " " << r.w() << std::endl;
1130 }
1131 
1132 void PlanningScene::setCurrentState(const moveit_msgs::RobotState& state)
1133 {
1134  // The attached bodies will be processed separately by processAttachedCollisionObjectMsgs
1135  // after robot_state_ has been updated
1136  moveit_msgs::RobotState state_no_attached(state);
1137  state_no_attached.attached_collision_objects.clear();
1138 
1139  if (parent_)
1140  {
1141  if (!robot_state_)
1142  {
1143  robot_state_ = std::make_shared<moveit::core::RobotState>(parent_->getCurrentState());
1144  robot_state_->setAttachedBodyUpdateCallback(current_state_attached_body_callback_);
1145  }
1146  moveit::core::robotStateMsgToRobotState(getTransforms(), state_no_attached, *robot_state_);
1147  }
1148  else
1149  moveit::core::robotStateMsgToRobotState(*scene_transforms_, state_no_attached, *robot_state_);
1150 
1151  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < state.attached_collision_objects.size(); ++i)
1152  {
1153  if (!state.is_diff && state.attached_collision_objects[i].object.operation != moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD)
1154  {
1155  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME,
1156  "The specified RobotState is not marked as is_diff. "
1157  "The request to modify the object '%s' is not supported. Object is ignored.",
1158  state.attached_collision_objects[i].object.id.c_str());
1159  continue;
1160  }
1161  processAttachedCollisionObjectMsg(state.attached_collision_objects[i]);
1162  }
1163 }
1164 
1165 void PlanningScene::setCurrentState(const moveit::core::RobotState& state)
1166 {
1167  getCurrentStateNonConst() = state;
1168 }
1169 
1170 void PlanningScene::decoupleParent()
1171 {
1172  if (!parent_)
1173  return;
1174 
1175  // This child planning scene did not have its own copy of frame transforms
1176  if (!scene_transforms_)
1177  {
1178  scene_transforms_ = std::make_shared<SceneTransforms>(this);
1179  scene_transforms_->setAllTransforms(parent_->getTransforms().getAllTransforms());
1180  }
1181 
1182  if (!robot_state_)
1183  {
1184  robot_state_ = std::make_shared<moveit::core::RobotState>(parent_->getCurrentState());
1185  robot_state_->setAttachedBodyUpdateCallback(current_state_attached_body_callback_);
1186  }
1187 
1188  if (!acm_)
1189  acm_ = std::make_shared<collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix>(parent_->getAllowedCollisionMatrix());
1190 
1191  for (std::pair<const std::string, CollisionDetectorPtr>& it : collision_)
1192  {
1193  it.second->parent_.reset();
1194  }
1195  world_diff_.reset();
1196 
1197  if (!object_colors_)
1198  {
1199  ObjectColorMap kc;
1200  parent_->getKnownObjectColors(kc);
1201  object_colors_ = std::make_unique<ObjectColorMap>(kc);
1202  }
1203  else
1204  {
1205  ObjectColorMap kc;
1206  parent_->getKnownObjectColors(kc);
1207  for (ObjectColorMap::const_iterator it = kc.begin(); it != kc.end(); ++it)
1208  if (object_colors_->find(it->first) == object_colors_->end())
1209  (*object_colors_)[it->first] = it->second;
1210  }
1211 
1212  if (!object_types_)
1213  {
1214  ObjectTypeMap kc;
1215  parent_->getKnownObjectTypes(kc);
1216  object_types_ = std::make_unique<ObjectTypeMap>(kc);
1217  }
1218  else
1219  {
1220  ObjectTypeMap kc;
1221  parent_->getKnownObjectTypes(kc);
1222  for (ObjectTypeMap::const_iterator it = kc.begin(); it != kc.end(); ++it)
1223  if (object_types_->find(it->first) == object_types_->end())
1224  (*object_types_)[it->first] = it->second;
1225  }
1226 
1227  parent_.reset();
1228 }
1229 
1230 bool PlanningScene::setPlanningSceneDiffMsg(const moveit_msgs::PlanningScene& scene_msg)
1231 {
1232  bool result = true;
1233 
1234  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Adding planning scene diff");
1235  if (!scene_msg.name.empty())
1236  name_ = scene_msg.name;
1237 
1238  if (!scene_msg.robot_model_name.empty() && scene_msg.robot_model_name != getRobotModel()->getName())
1239  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Setting the scene for model '%s' but model '%s' is loaded.",
1240  scene_msg.robot_model_name.c_str(), getRobotModel()->getName().c_str());
1241 
1242  // there is at least one transform in the list of fixed transform: from model frame to itself;
1243  // if the list is empty, then nothing has been set
1244  if (!scene_msg.fixed_frame_transforms.empty())
1245  {
1246  if (!scene_transforms_)
1247  scene_transforms_ = std::make_shared<SceneTransforms>(this);
1248  scene_transforms_->setTransforms(scene_msg.fixed_frame_transforms);
1249  }
1250 
1251  // if at least some joints have been specified, we set them
1252  if (!scene_msg.robot_state.multi_dof_joint_state.joint_names.empty() ||
1253  !scene_msg.robot_state.joint_state.name.empty() || !scene_msg.robot_state.attached_collision_objects.empty())
1254  setCurrentState(scene_msg.robot_state);
1255 
1256  // if at least some links are mentioned in the allowed collision matrix, then we have an update
1257  if (!scene_msg.allowed_collision_matrix.entry_names.empty())
1258  acm_ = std::make_shared<collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix>(scene_msg.allowed_collision_matrix);
1259 
1260  if (!scene_msg.link_padding.empty() || !scene_msg.link_scale.empty())
1261  {
1262  for (std::pair<const std::string, CollisionDetectorPtr>& it : collision_)
1263  {
1264  it.second->cenv_->setPadding(scene_msg.link_padding);
1265  it.second->cenv_->setScale(scene_msg.link_scale);
1266  }
1267  }
1268 
1269  // if any colors have been specified, replace the ones we have with the specified ones
1270  for (const moveit_msgs::ObjectColor& object_color : scene_msg.object_colors)
1271  setObjectColor(object_color.id, object_color.color);
1272 
1273  // process collision object updates
1274  for (const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& collision_object : scene_msg.world.collision_objects)
1275  result &= processCollisionObjectMsg(collision_object);
1276 
1277  // if an octomap was specified, replace the one we have with that one
1278  if (!scene_msg.world.octomap.octomap.data.empty())
1279  processOctomapMsg(scene_msg.world.octomap);
1280 
1281  return result;
1282 }
1283 
1284 bool PlanningScene::setPlanningSceneMsg(const moveit_msgs::PlanningScene& scene_msg)
1285 {
1286  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Setting new planning scene: '%s'", scene_msg.name.c_str());
1287  name_ = scene_msg.name;
1288 
1289  if (!scene_msg.robot_model_name.empty() && scene_msg.robot_model_name != getRobotModel()->getName())
1290  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Setting the scene for model '%s' but model '%s' is loaded.",
1291  scene_msg.robot_model_name.c_str(), getRobotModel()->getName().c_str());
1292 
1293  if (parent_)
1294  decoupleParent();
1295 
1296  object_types_.reset();
1297  scene_transforms_->setTransforms(scene_msg.fixed_frame_transforms);
1298  setCurrentState(scene_msg.robot_state);
1299  acm_ = std::make_shared<collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix>(scene_msg.allowed_collision_matrix);
1300  for (std::pair<const std::string, CollisionDetectorPtr>& it : collision_)
1301  {
1302  it.second->cenv_->setPadding(scene_msg.link_padding);
1303  it.second->cenv_->setScale(scene_msg.link_scale);
1304  }
1305  object_colors_ = std::make_unique<ObjectColorMap>();
1306  for (const moveit_msgs::ObjectColor& object_color : scene_msg.object_colors)
1307  setObjectColor(object_color.id, object_color.color);
1308  world_->clearObjects();
1309  return processPlanningSceneWorldMsg(scene_msg.world);
1310 }
1311 
1312 bool PlanningScene::processPlanningSceneWorldMsg(const moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneWorld& world)
1313 {
1314  bool result = true;
1315  for (const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& collision_object : world.collision_objects)
1316  result &= processCollisionObjectMsg(collision_object);
1317  processOctomapMsg(world.octomap);
1318  return result;
1319 }
1320 
1321 bool PlanningScene::usePlanningSceneMsg(const moveit_msgs::PlanningScene& scene_msg)
1322 {
1323  if (scene_msg.is_diff)
1324  return setPlanningSceneDiffMsg(scene_msg);
1325  else
1326  return setPlanningSceneMsg(scene_msg);
1327 }
1328 
1329 collision_detection::OccMapTreePtr createOctomap(const octomap_msgs::Octomap& map)
1330 {
1331  std::shared_ptr<collision_detection::OccMapTree> om =
1332  std::make_shared<collision_detection::OccMapTree>(map.resolution);
1333  if (map.binary)
1334  {
1335  octomap_msgs::readTree(om.get(), map);
1336  }
1337  else
1338  {
1339  std::stringstream datastream;
1340  if (!map.data.empty())
1341  {
1342  datastream.write((const char*)&map.data[0], map.data.size());
1343  om->readData(datastream);
1344  }
1345  }
1346  return om;
1347 }
1348 
1349 void PlanningScene::processOctomapMsg(const octomap_msgs::Octomap& map)
1350 {
1351  // each octomap replaces any previous one
1352  world_->removeObject(OCTOMAP_NS);
1353 
1354  if (map.data.empty())
1355  return;
1356 
1357  if (map.id != "OcTree")
1358  {
1359  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Received octomap is of type '%s' but type 'OcTree' is expected.", map.id.c_str());
1360  return;
1361  }
1362 
1363  std::shared_ptr<collision_detection::OccMapTree> om = createOctomap(map);
1364  if (!map.header.frame_id.empty())
1365  {
1366  const Eigen::Isometry3d& t = getFrameTransform(map.header.frame_id);
1367  world_->addToObject(OCTOMAP_NS, shapes::ShapeConstPtr(new shapes::OcTree(om)), t);
1368  }
1369  else
1370  {
1371  world_->addToObject(OCTOMAP_NS, shapes::ShapeConstPtr(new shapes::OcTree(om)), Eigen::Isometry3d::Identity());
1372  }
1373 }
1374 
1375 void PlanningScene::removeAllCollisionObjects()
1376 {
1377  const std::vector<std::string>& object_ids = world_->getObjectIds();
1378  for (const std::string& object_id : object_ids)
1379  if (object_id != OCTOMAP_NS)
1380  {
1381  world_->removeObject(object_id);
1382  removeObjectColor(object_id);
1383  removeObjectType(object_id);
1384  }
1385 }
1386 
1387 void PlanningScene::processOctomapMsg(const octomap_msgs::OctomapWithPose& map)
1388 {
1389  // each octomap replaces any previous one
1390  world_->removeObject(OCTOMAP_NS);
1391 
1392  if (map.octomap.data.empty())
1393  return;
1394 
1395  if (map.octomap.id != "OcTree")
1396  {
1397  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Received octomap is of type '%s' but type 'OcTree' is expected.", map.octomap.id.c_str());
1398  return;
1399  }
1400 
1401  std::shared_ptr<collision_detection::OccMapTree> om = createOctomap(map.octomap);
1402 
1403  const Eigen::Isometry3d& t = getFrameTransform(map.header.frame_id);
1404  Eigen::Isometry3d p;
1405  PlanningScene::poseMsgToEigen(map.origin, p);
1406  p = t * p;
1407  world_->addToObject(OCTOMAP_NS, shapes::ShapeConstPtr(new shapes::OcTree(om)), p);
1408 }
1409 
1410 void PlanningScene::processOctomapPtr(const std::shared_ptr<const octomap::OcTree>& octree, const Eigen::Isometry3d& t)
1411 {
1412  collision_detection::CollisionEnv::ObjectConstPtr map = world_->getObject(OCTOMAP_NS);
1413  if (map)
1414  {
1415  if (map->shapes_.size() == 1)
1416  {
1417  // check to see if we have the same octree pointer & pose.
1418  const shapes::OcTree* o = static_cast<const shapes::OcTree*>(map->shapes_[0].get());
1419  if (o->octree == octree)
1420  {
1421  // if the pose changed, we update it
1422  if (map->shape_poses_[0].isApprox(t, std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() * 100.0))
1423  {
1424  if (world_diff_)
1425  world_diff_->set(OCTOMAP_NS, collision_detection::World::DESTROY | collision_detection::World::CREATE |
1426  collision_detection::World::ADD_SHAPE);
1427  }
1428  else
1429  {
1430  shapes::ShapeConstPtr shape = map->shapes_[0];
1431  map.reset(); // reset this pointer first so that caching optimizations can be used in CollisionWorld
1432  world_->moveShapeInObject(OCTOMAP_NS, shape, t);
1433  }
1434  return;
1435  }
1436  }
1437  }
1438  // if the octree pointer changed, update the structure
1439  world_->removeObject(OCTOMAP_NS);
1440  world_->addToObject(OCTOMAP_NS, shapes::ShapeConstPtr(new shapes::OcTree(octree)), t);
1441 }
1442 
1443 bool PlanningScene::processAttachedCollisionObjectMsg(const moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject& object)
1444 {
1445  if (object.object.operation == moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD && !getRobotModel()->hasLinkModel(object.link_name))
1446  {
1447  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Unable to attach a body to link '%s' (link not found)", object.link_name.c_str());
1448  return false;
1449  }
1450 
1451  if (object.object.id == OCTOMAP_NS)
1452  {
1453  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "The ID '%s' cannot be used for collision objects (name reserved)", OCTOMAP_NS.c_str());
1454  return false;
1455  }
1456 
1457  if (!robot_state_) // there must be a parent in this case
1458  {
1459  robot_state_ = std::make_shared<moveit::core::RobotState>(parent_->getCurrentState());
1460  robot_state_->setAttachedBodyUpdateCallback(current_state_attached_body_callback_);
1461  }
1462  robot_state_->update();
1463 
1464  // The ADD/REMOVE operations follow this order:
1465  // STEP 1: Get info about the object from either the message or the world/RobotState
1466  // STEP 2: Remove the object from the world/RobotState if necessary
1467  // STEP 3: Put the object in the RobotState/world
1468 
1469  if (object.object.operation == moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD ||
1470  object.object.operation == moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::APPEND)
1471  {
1472  const moveit::core::LinkModel* link_model = getRobotModel()->getLinkModel(object.link_name);
1473  if (link_model)
1474  {
1475  // items to build the attached object from (filled from existing world object or message)
1476  Eigen::Isometry3d object_pose_in_link;
1477  std::vector<shapes::ShapeConstPtr> shapes;
1478  EigenSTL::vector_Isometry3d shape_poses;
1479  moveit::core::FixedTransformsMap subframe_poses;
1480 
1481  // STEP 1: Obtain info about object to be attached.
1482  // If it is in the world, message contents are ignored.
1483 
1484  collision_detection::CollisionEnv::ObjectConstPtr obj_in_world = world_->getObject(object.object.id);
1485  if (object.object.operation == moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD && object.object.primitives.empty() &&
1486  object.object.meshes.empty() && object.object.planes.empty())
1487  {
1488  if (obj_in_world)
1489  {
1490  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Attaching world object '%s' to link '%s'", object.object.id.c_str(),
1491  object.link_name.c_str());
1492  object_pose_in_link = robot_state_->getGlobalLinkTransform(link_model).inverse() * obj_in_world->pose_;
1493  shapes = obj_in_world->shapes_;
1494  shape_poses = obj_in_world->shape_poses_;
1495  subframe_poses = obj_in_world->subframe_poses_;
1496  }
1497  else
1498  {
1499  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME,
1500  "Attempting to attach object '%s' to link '%s' but no geometry specified "
1501  "and such an object does not exist in the collision world",
1502  object.object.id.c_str(), object.link_name.c_str());
1503  return false;
1504  }
1505  }
1506  else // If object is not in the world, use the message contents
1507  {
1508  Eigen::Isometry3d header_frame_to_object_pose;
1509  if (!shapesAndPosesFromCollisionObjectMessage(object.object, header_frame_to_object_pose, shapes, shape_poses))
1510  return false;
1511  const Eigen::Isometry3d world_to_header_frame = getFrameTransform(object.object.header.frame_id);
1512  const Eigen::Isometry3d link_to_header_frame =
1513  robot_state_->getGlobalLinkTransform(link_model).inverse() * world_to_header_frame;
1514  object_pose_in_link = link_to_header_frame * header_frame_to_object_pose;
1515 
1516  Eigen::Isometry3d subframe_pose;
1517  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < object.object.subframe_poses.size(); ++i)
1518  {
1519  PlanningScene::poseMsgToEigen(object.object.subframe_poses[i], subframe_pose);
1520  std::string name = object.object.subframe_names[i];
1521  subframe_poses[name] = subframe_pose;
1522  }
1523  }
1524 
1525  if (shapes.empty())
1526  {
1527  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "There is no geometry to attach to link '%s' as part of attached body '%s'",
1528  object.link_name.c_str(), object.object.id.c_str());
1529  return false;
1530  }
1531 
1532  if (!object.object.type.db.empty() || !object.object.type.key.empty())
1533  setObjectType(object.object.id, object.object.type);
1534 
1535  // STEP 2: Remove the object from the world (if it existed)
1536  if (obj_in_world && world_->removeObject(object.object.id))
1537  {
1538  if (object.object.operation == moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD)
1539  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Removing world object with the same name as newly attached object: '%s'",
1540  object.object.id.c_str());
1541  else
1542  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME,
1543  "You tried to append geometry to an attached object "
1544  "that is actually a world object ('%s'). World geometry is ignored.",
1545  object.object.id.c_str());
1546  }
1547 
1548  // STEP 3: Attach the object to the robot
1549  if (object.object.operation == moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD ||
1550  !robot_state_->hasAttachedBody(object.object.id))
1551  {
1552  if (robot_state_->clearAttachedBody(object.object.id))
1553  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME,
1554  "The robot state already had an object named '%s' attached to link '%s'. "
1555  "The object was replaced.",
1556  object.object.id.c_str(), object.link_name.c_str());
1557 
1558  robot_state_->attachBody(object.object.id, object_pose_in_link, shapes, shape_poses, object.touch_links,
1559  object.link_name, object.detach_posture, subframe_poses);
1560  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Attached object '%s' to link '%s'", object.object.id.c_str(),
1561  object.link_name.c_str());
1562  }
1563  else // APPEND: augment to existing attached object
1564  {
1565  const moveit::core::AttachedBody* ab = robot_state_->getAttachedBody(object.object.id);
1566 
1567  // Allow overriding the body's pose if provided, otherwise keep the old one
1568  if (moveit::core::isEmpty(object.object.pose))
1569  object_pose_in_link = ab->getPose(); // Keep old pose
1570 
1571  shapes.insert(shapes.end(), ab->getShapes().begin(), ab->getShapes().end());
1572  shape_poses.insert(shape_poses.end(), ab->getShapePoses().begin(), ab->getShapePoses().end());
1573  subframe_poses.insert(ab->getSubframes().begin(), ab->getSubframes().end());
1574  trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory detach_posture =
1575  object.detach_posture.joint_names.empty() ? ab->getDetachPosture() : object.detach_posture;
1576 
1577  std::set<std::string> touch_links = ab->getTouchLinks();
1578  touch_links.insert(std::make_move_iterator(object.touch_links.begin()),
1579  std::make_move_iterator(object.touch_links.end()));
1580 
1581  robot_state_->clearAttachedBody(object.object.id);
1582  robot_state_->attachBody(object.object.id, object_pose_in_link, shapes, shape_poses, touch_links,
1583  object.link_name, detach_posture, subframe_poses);
1584  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Appended things to object '%s' attached to link '%s'", object.object.id.c_str(),
1585  object.link_name.c_str());
1586  }
1587  return true;
1588  }
1589  else
1590  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Robot state is not compatible with robot model. This could be fatal.");
1591  }
1592  else if (object.object.operation == moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::REMOVE) // == DETACH
1593  {
1594  // STEP 1: Get info about the object from the RobotState
1595  std::vector<const moveit::core::AttachedBody*> attached_bodies;
1596  if (object.object.id.empty())
1597  {
1598  const moveit::core::LinkModel* link_model =
1599  object.link_name.empty() ? nullptr : getRobotModel()->getLinkModel(object.link_name);
1600  if (link_model) // if we have a link model specified, only fetch bodies attached to this link
1601  robot_state_->getAttachedBodies(attached_bodies, link_model);
1602  else
1603  robot_state_->getAttachedBodies(attached_bodies);
1604  }
1605  else // A specific object id will be removed.
1606  {
1607  const moveit::core::AttachedBody* body = robot_state_->getAttachedBody(object.object.id);
1608  if (body)
1609  {
1610  if (!object.link_name.empty() && (body->getAttachedLinkName() != object.link_name))
1611  {
1612  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "The AttachedCollisionObject message states the object is attached to "
1613  << object.link_name << ", but it is actually attached to "
1614  << body->getAttachedLinkName()
1615  << ". Leave the link_name empty or specify the correct link.");
1616  return false;
1617  }
1618  attached_bodies.push_back(body);
1619  }
1620  }
1621 
1622  // STEP 2+3: Remove the attached object(s) from the RobotState and put them in the world
1623  for (const moveit::core::AttachedBody* attached_body : attached_bodies)
1624  {
1625  const std::string& name = attached_body->getName();
1626  if (world_->hasObject(name))
1627  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME,
1628  "The collision world already has an object with the same name as the body about to be detached. "
1629  "NOT adding the detached body '%s' to the collision world.",
1630  object.object.id.c_str());
1631  else
1632  {
1633  const Eigen::Isometry3d& pose = attached_body->getGlobalPose();
1634  world_->addToObject(name, pose, attached_body->getShapes(), attached_body->getShapePoses());
1635  world_->setSubframesOfObject(name, attached_body->getSubframes());
1636  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Detached object '%s' from link '%s' and added it back in the collision world",
1637  name.c_str(), object.link_name.c_str());
1638  }
1639 
1640  robot_state_->clearAttachedBody(name);
1641  }
1642  if (!attached_bodies.empty() || object.object.id.empty())
1643  return true;
1644  }
1645  else if (object.object.operation == moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::MOVE)
1646  {
1647  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Move for attached objects not yet implemented");
1648  }
1649  else
1650  {
1651  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Unknown collision object operation: %d", object.object.operation);
1652  }
1653 
1654  return false;
1655 }
1656 
1657 bool PlanningScene::processCollisionObjectMsg(const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& object)
1658 {
1659  if (object.id == OCTOMAP_NS)
1660  {
1661  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "The ID '%s' cannot be used for collision objects (name reserved)", OCTOMAP_NS.c_str());
1662  return false;
1663  }
1664 
1665  if (object.operation == moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD || object.operation == moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::APPEND)
1666  {
1667  return processCollisionObjectAdd(object);
1668  }
1669  else if (object.operation == moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::REMOVE)
1670  {
1671  return processCollisionObjectRemove(object);
1672  }
1673  else if (object.operation == moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::MOVE)
1674  {
1675  return processCollisionObjectMove(object);
1676  }
1677 
1678  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Unknown collision object operation: %d", object.operation);
1679  return false;
1680 }
1681 
1682 void PlanningScene::poseMsgToEigen(const geometry_msgs::Pose& msg, Eigen::Isometry3d& out)
1683 {
1684  Eigen::Translation3d translation(msg.position.x, msg.position.y, msg.position.z);
1685  Eigen::Quaterniond quaternion(msg.orientation.w, msg.orientation.x, msg.orientation.y, msg.orientation.z);
1686  if ((quaternion.x() == 0) && (quaternion.y() == 0) && (quaternion.z() == 0) && (quaternion.w() == 0))
1687  {
1688  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Empty quaternion found in pose message. Setting to neutral orientation.");
1689  quaternion.setIdentity();
1690  }
1691  else
1692  {
1693  quaternion.normalize();
1694  }
1695  out = translation * quaternion;
1696 }
1697 
1698 bool PlanningScene::shapesAndPosesFromCollisionObjectMessage(const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& object,
1699  Eigen::Isometry3d& object_pose,
1700  std::vector<shapes::ShapeConstPtr>& shapes,
1701  EigenSTL::vector_Isometry3d& shape_poses)
1702 {
1703  if (object.primitives.size() < object.primitive_poses.size())
1704  {
1705  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "More primitive shape poses than shapes in collision object message.");
1706  return false;
1707  }
1708  if (object.meshes.size() < object.mesh_poses.size())
1709  {
1710  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "More mesh poses than meshes in collision object message.");
1711  return false;
1712  }
1713  if (object.planes.size() < object.plane_poses.size())
1714  {
1715  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "More plane poses than planes in collision object message.");
1716  return false;
1717  }
1718 
1719  const int num_shapes = object.primitives.size() + object.meshes.size() + object.planes.size();
1720  shapes.reserve(num_shapes);
1721  shape_poses.reserve(num_shapes);
1722 
1723  PlanningScene::poseMsgToEigen(object.pose, object_pose);
1724 
1725  bool switch_object_pose_and_shape_pose = false;
1726  if (num_shapes == 1)
1727  if (moveit::core::isEmpty(object.pose))
1728  {
1729  switch_object_pose_and_shape_pose = true; // If the object pose is not set but the shape pose is,
1730  // use the shape's pose as the object pose.
1731  }
1732 
1733  auto append = [&object_pose, &shapes, &shape_poses,
1734  &switch_object_pose_and_shape_pose](shapes::Shape* s, const geometry_msgs::Pose& pose_msg) {
1735  if (!s)
1736  return;
1737  Eigen::Isometry3d pose;
1738  PlanningScene::poseMsgToEigen(pose_msg, pose);
1739  if (!switch_object_pose_and_shape_pose)
1740  shape_poses.emplace_back(std::move(pose));
1741  else
1742  {
1743  shape_poses.emplace_back(std::move(object_pose));
1744  object_pose = pose;
1745  }
1746  shapes.emplace_back(shapes::ShapeConstPtr(s));
1747  };
1748 
1749  auto treat_shape_vectors = [&append](const auto& shape_vector, // the shape_msgs of each type
1750  const auto& shape_poses_vector, // std::vector<const geometry_msgs::Pose>
1751  const std::string& shape_type) {
1752  if (shape_vector.size() > shape_poses_vector.size())
1753  {
1754  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Number of " << shape_type
1755  << " does not match number of poses "
1756  "in collision object message. Assuming identity.");
1757  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < shape_vector.size(); ++i)
1758  {
1759  if (i >= shape_poses_vector.size())
1760  {
1761  // Empty shape pose => Identity
1762  geometry_msgs::Pose identity;
1763  identity.orientation.w = 1.0;
1764  append(shapes::constructShapeFromMsg(shape_vector[i]), identity);
1765  }
1766  else
1767  append(shapes::constructShapeFromMsg(shape_vector[i]), shape_poses_vector[i]);
1768  }
1769  }
1770  else
1771  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < shape_vector.size(); ++i)
1772  append(shapes::constructShapeFromMsg(shape_vector[i]), shape_poses_vector[i]);
1773  };
1774 
1775  treat_shape_vectors(object.primitives, object.primitive_poses, std::string("primitive_poses"));
1776  treat_shape_vectors(object.meshes, object.mesh_poses, std::string("meshes"));
1777  treat_shape_vectors(object.planes, object.plane_poses, std::string("planes"));
1778  return true;
1779 }
1780 
1781 bool PlanningScene::processCollisionObjectAdd(const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& object)
1782 {
1783  if (!knowsFrameTransform(object.header.frame_id))
1784  {
1785  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Unknown frame: " << object.header.frame_id);
1786  return false;
1787  }
1788 
1789  if (object.primitives.empty() && object.meshes.empty() && object.planes.empty())
1790  {
1791  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "There are no shapes specified in the collision object message");
1792  return false;
1793  }
1794 
1795  // replace the object if ADD is specified instead of APPEND
1796  if (object.operation == moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD && world_->hasObject(object.id))
1797  world_->removeObject(object.id);
1798 
1799  const Eigen::Isometry3d& world_to_object_header_transform = getFrameTransform(object.header.frame_id);
1800  Eigen::Isometry3d header_to_pose_transform;
1801  std::vector<shapes::ShapeConstPtr> shapes;
1802  EigenSTL::vector_Isometry3d shape_poses;
1803  if (!shapesAndPosesFromCollisionObjectMessage(object, header_to_pose_transform, shapes, shape_poses))
1804  return false;
1805  const Eigen::Isometry3d object_frame_transform = world_to_object_header_transform * header_to_pose_transform;
1806 
1807  world_->addToObject(object.id, object_frame_transform, shapes, shape_poses);
1808 
1809  if (!object.type.key.empty() || !object.type.db.empty())
1810  setObjectType(object.id, object.type);
1811 
1812  // Add subframes
1813  moveit::core::FixedTransformsMap subframes;
1814  Eigen::Isometry3d subframe_pose;
1815  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < object.subframe_poses.size(); ++i)
1816  {
1817  PlanningScene::poseMsgToEigen(object.subframe_poses[i], subframe_pose);
1818  std::string name = object.subframe_names[i];
1819  subframes[name] = subframe_pose;
1820  }
1821  world_->setSubframesOfObject(object.id, subframes);
1822  return true;
1823 }
1824 
1825 bool PlanningScene::processCollisionObjectRemove(const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& object)
1826 {
1827  if (object.id.empty())
1828  {
1829  removeAllCollisionObjects();
1830  }
1831  else
1832  {
1833  if (!world_->removeObject(object.id))
1834  {
1835  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME,
1836  "Tried to remove world object '" << object.id << "', but it does not exist in this scene.");
1837  return false;
1838  }
1839 
1840  removeObjectColor(object.id);
1841  removeObjectType(object.id);
1842  }
1843  return true;
1844 }
1845 
1846 bool PlanningScene::processCollisionObjectMove(const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& object)
1847 {
1848  if (world_->hasObject(object.id))
1849  {
1850  if (!object.primitives.empty() || !object.meshes.empty() || !object.planes.empty())
1851  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Move operation for object '%s' ignores the geometry specified in the message.",
1852  object.id.c_str());
1853 
1854  const Eigen::Isometry3d& world_to_object_header_transform = getFrameTransform(object.header.frame_id);
1855  Eigen::Isometry3d header_to_pose_transform;
1856 
1857  PlanningScene::poseMsgToEigen(object.pose, header_to_pose_transform);
1858 
1859  const Eigen::Isometry3d object_frame_transform = world_to_object_header_transform * header_to_pose_transform;
1860  world_->setObjectPose(object.id, object_frame_transform);
1861  return true;
1862  }
1863 
1864  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "World object '%s' does not exist. Cannot move.", object.id.c_str());
1865  return false;
1866 }
1867 
1868 const Eigen::Isometry3d& PlanningScene::getFrameTransform(const std::string& frame_id) const
1869 {
1870  return getFrameTransform(getCurrentState(), frame_id);
1871 }
1872 
1873 const Eigen::Isometry3d& PlanningScene::getFrameTransform(const std::string& frame_id)
1874 {
1875  if (getCurrentState().dirtyLinkTransforms())
1876  return getFrameTransform(getCurrentStateNonConst(), frame_id);
1877  else
1878  return getFrameTransform(getCurrentState(), frame_id);
1879 }
1880 
1881 const Eigen::Isometry3d& PlanningScene::getFrameTransform(const moveit::core::RobotState& state,
1882  const std::string& frame_id) const
1883 {
1884  if (!frame_id.empty() && frame_id[0] == '/')
1885  // Recursively call itself without the slash in front of frame name
1886  return getFrameTransform(frame_id.substr(1));
1887 
1888  bool frame_found;
1889  const Eigen::Isometry3d& t1 = state.getFrameTransform(frame_id, &frame_found);
1890  if (frame_found)
1891  return t1;
1892 
1893  const Eigen::Isometry3d& t2 = getWorld()->getTransform(frame_id, frame_found);
1894  if (frame_found)
1895  return t2;
1896  return getTransforms().Transforms::getTransform(frame_id);
1897 }
1898 
1899 bool PlanningScene::knowsFrameTransform(const std::string& frame_id) const
1900 {
1901  return knowsFrameTransform(getCurrentState(), frame_id);
1902 }
1903 
1904 bool PlanningScene::knowsFrameTransform(const moveit::core::RobotState& state, const std::string& frame_id) const
1905 {
1906  if (!frame_id.empty() && frame_id[0] == '/')
1907  return knowsFrameTransform(frame_id.substr(1));
1908 
1909  if (state.knowsFrameTransform(frame_id))
1910  return true;
1911  if (getWorld()->knowsTransform(frame_id))
1912  return true;
1913  return getTransforms().Transforms::canTransform(frame_id);
1914 }

1917 {
1918  if (object_types_)
1919  if (object_types_->find(object_id) != object_types_->end())
1920  return true;
1921  if (parent_)
1922  return parent_->hasObjectType(object_id);
1923  return false;
1924 }

1929  {
1930  ObjectTypeMap::const_iterator it = object_types_->find(object_id);
1931  if (it != object_types_->end())
1932  return it->second;
1933  }
1934  if (parent_)
1935  return parent_->getObjectType(object_id);
1936  static const object_recognition_msgs::ObjectType EMPTY;
1937  return EMPTY;
1938 }

2066 bool PlanningScene::isStateConstrained(const moveit::core::RobotState& state, const moveit_msgs::Constraints& constr,
2067  bool verbose) const
2068 {
2069  kinematic_constraints::KinematicConstraintSetPtr ks(
2070  new kinematic_constraints::KinematicConstraintSet(getRobotModel()));
2071  ks->add(constr, getTransforms());
2072  if (ks->empty())
2073  return true;
2074  else
2075  return isStateConstrained(state, *ks, verbose);
2076 }

2087  const kinematic_constraints::KinematicConstraintSet& constr, bool verbose) const
2088 {

2090 }

2151 bool PlanningScene::isPathValid(const moveit_msgs::RobotState& start_state,
2152  const moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory& trajectory,
2153  const moveit_msgs::Constraints& path_constraints,
2154  const moveit_msgs::Constraints& goal_constraints, const std::string& group,
2155  bool verbose, std::vector<std::size_t>* invalid_index) const
2156 {

2160 
2161 bool PlanningScene::isPathValid(const moveit_msgs::RobotState& start_state,
2162  const moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory& trajectory,
2163  const moveit_msgs::Constraints& path_constraints,
2164  const std::vector<moveit_msgs::Constraints>& goal_constraints, const std::string& group,
2165  bool verbose, std::vector<std::size_t>* invalid_index) const
2166 {
2167  robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory t(getRobotModel(), group);
2168  moveit::core::RobotState start(getCurrentState());
2169  moveit::core::robotStateMsgToRobotState(getTransforms(), start_state, start);
2170  t.setRobotTrajectoryMsg(start, trajectory);
2171  return isPathValid(t, path_constraints, goal_constraints, group, verbose, invalid_index);
2172 }
2173 
2174 bool PlanningScene::isPathValid(const robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory& trajectory,
2175  const moveit_msgs::Constraints& path_constraints,
2176  const std::vector<moveit_msgs::Constraints>& goal_constraints, const std::string& group,
2177  bool verbose, std::vector<std::size_t>* invalid_index) const
2178 {
2179  bool result = true;
2180  if (invalid_index)
2181  invalid_index->clear();
2182  kinematic_constraints::KinematicConstraintSet ks_p(getRobotModel());
2183  ks_p.add(path_constraints, getTransforms());
2184  std::size_t n_wp = trajectory.getWayPointCount();
2185  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < n_wp; ++i)
2186  {
2187  const moveit::core::RobotState& st = trajectory.getWayPoint(i);
2188 
2189  bool this_state_valid = true;
2190  if (isStateColliding(st, group, verbose))
2191  this_state_valid = false;
2192  if (!isStateFeasible(st, verbose))
2193  this_state_valid = false;
2194  if (!ks_p.empty() && !ks_p.decide(st, verbose).satisfied)
2195  this_state_valid = false;
2196 
2197  if (!this_state_valid)
2198  {
2199  if (invalid_index)
2200  invalid_index->push_back(i);
2201  else
2202  return false;
2203  result = false;
2204  }
2205 
2206  // check goal for last state
2207  if (i + 1 == n_wp && !goal_constraints.empty())
2208  {
2209  bool found = false;
2210  for (const moveit_msgs::Constraints& goal_constraint : goal_constraints)
2211  {
2212  if (isStateConstrained(st, goal_constraint))
2213  {
2214  found = true;
2215  break;
2216  }
2217  }
2218  if (!found)
2219  {
2220  if (verbose)
2221  ROS_INFO_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Goal not satisfied");
2222  if (invalid_index)
2223  invalid_index->push_back(i);
2224  result = false;
2225  }
2226  }
2227  }
2228  return result;
2229 }
2230 
2231 bool PlanningScene::isPathValid(const robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory& trajectory,
2232  const moveit_msgs::Constraints& path_constraints,
2233  const moveit_msgs::Constraints& goal_constraints, const std::string& group,
2234  bool verbose, std::vector<std::size_t>* invalid_index) const
2235 {
2236  std::vector<moveit_msgs::Constraints> goal_constraints_vector(1, goal_constraints);
2237  return isPathValid(trajectory, path_constraints, goal_constraints_vector, group, verbose, invalid_index);
2238 }

2241  const moveit_msgs::Constraints& path_constraints, const std::string& group,
2242  bool verbose, std::vector<std::size_t>* invalid_index) const
2243 {
2244  static const std::vector<moveit_msgs::Constraints> EMP_CONSTRAINTS_VECTOR;
2245  return isPathValid(trajectory, path_constraints, EMP_CONSTRAINTS_VECTOR, group, verbose, invalid_index);
2246 }

2250 {

2252  static const std::vector<moveit_msgs::Constraints> EMP_CONSTRAINTS_VECTOR;

2255 
2256 void PlanningScene::getCostSources(const robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory& trajectory, std::size_t max_costs,
2257  std::set<collision_detection::CostSource>& costs, double overlap_fraction) const
2258 {
2259  getCostSources(trajectory, max_costs, std::string(), costs, overlap_fraction);
2260 }
2261 
2262 void PlanningScene::getCostSources(const robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory& trajectory, std::size_t max_costs,
2263  const std::string& group_name, std::set<collision_detection::CostSource>& costs,
2264  double overlap_fraction) const
2265 {
2266  collision_detection::CollisionRequest creq;
2267  creq.max_cost_sources = max_costs;
2268  creq.group_name = group_name;
2269  creq.cost = true;
2270  std::set<collision_detection::CostSource> cs;
2271  std::set<collision_detection::CostSource> cs_start;
2272  std::size_t n_wp = trajectory.getWayPointCount();
2273  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < n_wp; ++i)
2274  {
2275  collision_detection::CollisionResult cres;
2276  checkCollision(creq, cres, trajectory.getWayPoint(i));
2277  cs.insert(cres.cost_sources.begin(), cres.cost_sources.end());
2278  if (i == 0)
2279  cs_start.swap(cres.cost_sources);
2280  }
2281 
2282  if (cs.size() <= max_costs)
2283  costs.swap(cs);
2284  else
2285  {
2286  costs.clear();
2287  std::size_t i = 0;
2288  for (std::set<collision_detection::CostSource>::iterator it = cs.begin(); i < max_costs; ++it, ++i)
2289  costs.insert(*it);
2290  }
2291 
2292  collision_detection::removeCostSources(costs, cs_start, overlap_fraction);
2293  collision_detection::removeOverlapping(costs, overlap_fraction);
2294 }
2295 
2296 void PlanningScene::getCostSources(const moveit::core::RobotState& state, std::size_t max_costs,
2297  std::set<collision_detection::CostSource>& costs) const
2298 {
2299  getCostSources(state, max_costs, std::string(), costs);
2300 }
2301 
2302 void PlanningScene::getCostSources(const moveit::core::RobotState& state, std::size_t max_costs,
2303  const std::string& group_name,
2304  std::set<collision_detection::CostSource>& costs) const
2305 {
2306  collision_detection::CollisionRequest creq;
2307  creq.max_cost_sources = max_costs;
2308  creq.group_name = group_name;
2309  creq.cost = true;
2310  collision_detection::CollisionResult cres;
2311  checkCollision(creq, cres, state);
2312  cres.cost_sources.swap(costs);
2313 }
2314 
2315 void PlanningScene::printKnownObjects(std::ostream& out) const
2316 {
2317  const std::vector<std::string>& objects = getWorld()->getObjectIds();
2318  std::vector<const moveit::core::AttachedBody*> attached_bodies;
2319  getCurrentState().getAttachedBodies(attached_bodies);
2320 
2321  // Output
2322  out << "-----------------------------------------\n";
2323  out << "PlanningScene Known Objects:\n";
2324  out << " - Collision World Objects:\n ";
2325  for (const std::string& object : objects)
2326  {
2327  out << "\t- " << object << "\n";
2328  }
2329 
2330  out << " - Attached Bodies:\n";
2331  for (const moveit::core::AttachedBody* attached_body : attached_bodies)
2332  {
2333  out << "\t- " << attached_body->getName() << "\n";
2334  }
2335  out << "-----------------------------------------\n";
2336 }
2337 
2338 } // end of namespace planning_scene
